getStreamMode

public OutputTransform.StreamMode getStreamMode()

getEncodedOutputStream

public OutputStream getEncodedOutputStream()
Wraps the output stream with an encoder that will apply this transformation to the stream.

Returns:
a new output stream object that encodes the source stream.

getEncodedInputStream

public InputStream getEncodedInputStream()

getEncodedMetadata

public abstract Map<String,String> getEncodedMetadata()
Encodes the object's metadata. Usually, this is called after the output stream has been closed to get the updated object metadata but could also somehow transform existing metadata like encrypting it.

Returns:
the "encoded" metadata

getTransformConfig

public String getTransformConfig()
Gets this transformation's mode string, e.g. "COMP:LZMA/3"

Returns:
the mode string.
